snippet.title: TheFatRat & Laura Brehm - We'll Meet Again
snippet.description:
Download the song and the wallpaper for free on my website: https://www.thefatrat.com/
Pre-Save my new song "Genius" coming May 16th: https://thefatrat.ffm.to/genius
Listen to We'll Meet Again here 👉 https://thefatrat.ffm.to/wellmeetagain

💜 Subscribe for more FREE MUSIC: https://www.youtube.com/thefatrat 
👉 Check out my socials: https://ffm.bio/thefatrat

🌎Support me in helping children in Manila get education: https://charity.thefatrat.com/

💜 "We'll Meet Again" is 👉 FREE-to-use on YouTube, Twitch and other social media channels if you credit properly in your video description. Copy and paste the credits below. If you don’t credit properly, your video will get claimed.
________________________________________________
👉 Credits (please copy paste)
Music: TheFatRat & Laura Brehm - We'll Meet Again
Watch the official music video: https://youtu.be/hJqYc62NCKo
Listen to We'll Meet Again: https://thefatrat.ffm.to/wellmeetagain
Follow TheFatRat: https://ffm.bio/thefatrat
_________________________________________________

LYRICS ////////// TheFatRat - We'll Meet Again ////////// LYRICS

VERS 1
Suddenly you're nowhere to be found
I turn around and everything has changed
Looking for a way to work it out
I’m trying to find some peace to navigate

CHORUS
The oak tree
where I met you
and the writing
on the statue
I still remember every word you said

I’m not a soldier 
but i’m fighting
Can you hear me through the silence?
I won't give up cause
There will be a day
We’ll meet again

VERSE 2
Everything we wanted turned to gold
The path we chose, the future on our side
Never thought I’d do this on my own
But now I wield the sword you left behind

CHORUS

BRIDGE
Dark for the sunrise
Clouds for a blue sky
Space for the travelling star

Strong from the inside 
You're still my life-line
I feel you wherever you are  

CHORUS

////////////////////////////

Art by gtgraphics
Animation by @RefractArt
